Menu Description

The following describes the menus of a hypothetic tool.
In HTML this is done using a definition list, and by tagging each menu item with <STRONG class="menuitem">...</STRONG>. In a browser that does not know about style sheets, this will behave as an ordinary bold'ing tag, but when a style sheet is in effect, we can make it look quite different - much like a GIF screen dump of the actual menua item - but it's pure HTML (:-).

We have also included the menu-item in the alphabetic index by using the <INX>...</INX> tag around the menuitem definition. This will make the menu item appear in blue, to indicate thet it is indexed.
